description: We use a combination of double-fold Mexican vanilla extract and Madagascar bourbon vanilla paste for this classic flavor.
Made with cocoa powder and Callebaut chocolate.
Vanilla ice cream with Oreo sandwich cookie pieces.
Made with butter, cream, and lots of coarse sea salt, this is our most popular flavor.
Made with cold-brewed Bean Traders espresso beans and sweetened condensed milk.
A peppermint ice cream base with lots of white and dark chocolate peppermint bark pieces mixed in.
A sweet cream ice cream base with pieces of brown butter chocolate chip cookies and butter cookies.
Gluten free! Eggnog ice cream with chunks of gluten free gingerbread and a splash of rum extract (no booze)
Red wine cooked down to a syrup with star anise, cinnamon and clove, blended into our ice cream base.
Mint ice cream with pieces of peppermint brownies mixed in. *Vegan brownies are gluten free and contain almond flour
A rich vegan coconut base with coconut cream, nutmeg, cinnamon, ginger, allspice, spiced rum, and nutmeg cookies.
